title: Monument Valley 3
description: Monument Valley 3 continues the beloved series of impossible architecture and optical illusions. As lead artist, I was responsible for creating the distinctive visual style that builds upon the series' legacy while introducing fresh elements.

The challenge was to maintain the series' iconic minimalist aesthetic while introducing new gameplay mechanics. I focused on creating serene, meditative environments that guide the player through impossible geometric puzzles.
